channel.title: How can I stay safe? [Feel free to ask questions as well!]
channel.description:
[center][b]MOD's I am shooting for a Sticky here, just letting you know. xD. I doubt it will get stickied though, anyways...[/b]
There are a lot of things out there, you may not be aware of, like what server sources to download what a Private Server of RuneScape is, how things work at MoparScape.org forums, and what there is to learn about and do/explore. Well not to worry, because Dylan is here to help you young people out! ;)
[b]Chapter 1 - Stay Safe, and trust your computer![/b]
Your computer, is your friend! I recommend, some nice working safe virus scanners, and you may need to have all of them on your computer just for your safety. Please take a brisk look at these few Virus Scanner web's I have layed out for your safety.
[url=http://housecall65.trendmicro.com/]House Call Virus Scanner[/url] Description: I have often used this to scan my computer, I know I can rely on it, and I have it bookmarked. I recommend you do the same.
[url=http://free.grisoft.com/doc/1]Free Virus Scanner+Firewall[/url] Description: Thanks zenzie!
[url=http://virusscan.jotti.org/]VirusScan[/url] Description: Thanks to error.login on finding this Virus Scanner for me, I couldn't find it, even though I have used it before. Thank you for finding this error.login, I appreciate it.
[url=http://www.mcafee.com/us/]McAfee[/url] Description: Not recommended by most people, but I do often check this site and sometimes use it, I have it installed in my computer just for emergencies as it is very efficient.
Now that I have introduced some of my Virus Scanners, I would like to tell you what you should download, and what you should be weary about. If you see something in the [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?board=49.0]Downloads Section[/url] it is most likely clean, although there are some things you need to be aware of, if you ever get suspicious Private Messages, then the user that sent you it most likely doesn't want others to receive one as well, so watch out for this, and always scan before using!
Remember, your computer is your friend!
[b]Chapter 2 - How to Scan files on your computer![/b]
Ever download those packages of programs and your not sure what they are? I am going to give you a quick demonstration on how to scan your files. Now this may not be the way all people do it on there computers, this is just the way I do it, pay attention!
[b]Step 1:[/b]
When you download .rar files, most of the time will be a .rar file, it should come in this package:
[img]http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/5858/winrar1mj6.png[/img]
Now go to the file and drag it to your desktop or a specified area you will remember for later on.
[img]http://img68.imageshack.us/img68/6010/dragtodesktop1hz7.png[/img]
Now visit [url=http://www.kaspersky.com/scanforvirus]this[/url] site and click on the browse button and select your file then click submit.
[img]http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/9002/browseandfindyourfile1eb1.png[/img]
If you get a "Your Clean!" Message... Congratulations, the program you've downloaded is clean, and you're okay to use it! ;) If you get the other message, immediatly throw out the file and never touch it again!
[img]http://img151.imageshack.us/img151/649/yourclean1ty8.png[/img]
Congratulations, you've just virus scanned!
[b]How can I download WinRar?[/b]
WinRar can be download by clicking [url=http://www.rarlabs.com/rar/wrar37b8.exe]here[/url].
If you have any questions, feel free to ask them here, but if you feel people will make fun of you please PM me about it, and I will help you, and not give you a hard time about it, thank you for reading and stay safe.
I will be adding more soon!
[i]GoldenShard[/i][br][size=1]Posted on: May 12, 2007, 11:46:09 PM[/size][hr][b]What is a Private Server?[/b] Answer: What your getting yourself into... Is an amazing world, of unlimited creating things of your own RuneScape. As long as the source is not an .exe file, it is safe, and can be used wherever, whenever, as long as you have WinRar.
[b]How can I obtain a RuneScape Private Server?[/b] Answer: They may easily be obtained, please go to [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html]this[/url] section and pick your Source, then you may begin editing it. Some sources, I suggest you use, and I will give you the direct links are:
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=W474ZWQF]Fr33Sc4p3[/url] Description: This source was created by Fr33Sc4p3, a respectful member of the community, and a leader to others.
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=9GXQ69F3]Satan's Isle[/url] Description: This source was created by I Loot I, a respectful member as well of the community, he follows in the role of the good coders, he codes well and is highly respected.
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=82581.0;attach=5807]SvenScape PK[/url] Description: I've used this source many times, you may want to pick this source as it has many features not any ordinary source would have, and is created by the respectful Melissa T.
[url=http://www.sendspace.com/file/sqe9af]TestScape[/url] Description: It's not recommended by most people, but can be very helpful to some people when they want to expieriment, wonder why it's called TestScape? You got your answer, I highly recommend downloading this source just for a little testing here and there.
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=W8NCP0YC]Cheez'80[/url] Description: a Very amazing source for beginners, if you're new to private servers this is a nice source to start with!
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=16KZIJK5]PimpScape[/url] Description: Finally, PimpScape, a wonderful source, I recommend this for a lot of users. Especially, if you're a good coder or not a good coder. I recommend this source for anyone and I definently give it 5 stars.
[b]Who is it okay to trust?[/b] Answer: There is many people you may be able to trust on the forums, but the people that will not harm you in any way, and are always there for you are these people:
[b]Administrators:[/b] Moparisthebest Starblaster100
[b]Global Moderators:[/b] The-Unamed God of Ikiliki Miss Silabsoft Click Here Mod Taharok Lothy Jme_009 Adding more soon...
[b]MoparScape CMs:[/b] PaulT Alexia Xbox Modder GoldenShard Boomer216 Miss Silabsoft Zenzie Fr33Sc4p3 Mod Taharok Lothy God of Ikiliki Frank_ Darth_afro56 Bezza thiefmn6092 Click here Javacisnotrecognized ZeroFreeze Nwfd1025 Zoltanman Jme_009 Aftermath Ruler -fedexer- NewbieNewty
These are some of the people you may trust when asking for help, if I have missed anyone please PM me about it and I will add them here, no hard feelings.
[br][size=1]Posted on: May 12, 2007, 11:48:04 PM[/size][hr][center]Feel free to ask all questions here.[/center]

item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

GoldenShard:

GMOD - MoparScape Moderator.

Nope. Moderators can lock, sticky, remove topics, modify and delete people’s messages. Global Moderators can give warnings, mutes, moderations and bans.

item.dc:creator: @GoldenShard GoldenShard
item.description:
@GoldenShard wrote:

[quote=“Trator25, post:9, topic:94121”]My server was fine. Now it logs me out saying im already logged in. When I run the server it says:

Exception in thread “Thread 0” java.lang.NullPointerException
at server.run(server.java:151)
at java.lang.Thread.run (Unknown Source)

Please help me I’d be very grateful thank you very much.[/quote]

You may want to use Miss Silab’s Anti-Null Protection, as well try re-running your server.

Read full topic
